    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">
        <tei-surface data-origname="surface">
            <tei-graphic url="5271616.pdf_page_1.png" width="2479" height="3508" data-origname="graphic" data-origatts="height width url" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="392,2274 392,2380 2371,2380 2371,2274" id="eSc_textblock_ce5dae70" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="55,2339 55,2713 1203,2713 1203,2339" id="eSc_textblock_79199ad6" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2373,2694 2373,2384 1236,2384 1236,2694" id="eSc_textblock_611d3239" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="60,2738 60,3085 2416,3085 2416,2738" id="eSc_textblock_7a7e6e27" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>

            <tei-zone points="1114,3230 1114,3074 1327,3074 1327,3230" id="eSc_textblock_dbf156ed" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_34edb91d" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    Four persons facing a grand piano.
                    <tei-seg ana="#sitting_woman" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        Two women in dresses are sitting in chairs.
                    </tei-seg>
                    On man leaning on the piano, another man
                    standing next to the left sitting woman.
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_79199ad6" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-quote type="testimonial" data-origname="quote" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-seg ana="#home" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                    "It brings the world's greatest pianist into
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>my home
                </tei-seg>
                ... That's why I bought
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>it."
            </tei-quote>
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                The <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Licensee Reproducing Piano</tei-name>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>permits not the slightest variation from the artistry
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>of the great musician. Its playing is the artist's play-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ing;
            </tei-seg>
            <tei-seg ana="#virtual_presence" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                you have but to close your eyes to
                feel the pres-<tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>ence of the master at the keys.
            </tei-seg>
            It is modern magic.
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_611d3239" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon Licensee Reproducing Pianos</tei-name> are
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>offered by 115 leading piano manufacturers. Piano
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>merchants everywhere are anxious to demonstrate to
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>you. Send for our Book of Famous Artists. The
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-orgName data-origname="orgName">Auto Pneumatic Action Company</tei-orgName>,
            <tei-persName data-origname="persName">W. C. Heaton,</tei-persName>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>President,
            <tei-address data-origname="address">
                653 West 51st Street, New York, N. Y.
            </tei-address>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_7a7e6e27" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Licensee
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Reproducing Piano</tei-name>
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-seg type="slogan" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type">The Master's Fingers on your Piano</tei-seg>
        </tei-div>
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_dbf156ed" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                <tei-desc resp="#np" data-origname="desc" data-origatts="resp">
                    <tei-seg ana="#phantom_body" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                        Phantom Fingers.
                    </tei-seg>
                </tei-desc>
            </tei-figure>
        </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
